solution_line_template: First find the total amount of time Dan spends digging adult graves: {hours_per_adult_grave} hours/grave * {num_adult_graves} graves = <<{hours_per_adult_grave}*{num_adult_graves}={total_adult_time}>>{total_adult_time} hours

Then add the time to dig the child's grave to find the total time he spends digging: {total_adult_time} hours + {hours_per_child_grave} hours = <<{total_adult_time}+{hours_per_child_grave}={total_time}>>{total_time} hours
